attributes.action: Bring back Capital punishment for the most serous crimes.
attributes.additional_details: How would you feel if one of your family members was a victim of one of these crimes? Hopefully the same as me. Despite how much you're against the death penalty, put yourself in the shoes of the family who's brother, sister, son, daughter has been a victim of murder, rape or terrorism and then come back to me.
attributes.background: With the return of Capital punishment for crimes such as: Homicide, Serial murder, Genocide, Terrorism and Rape, crimes would reduce immediately with the knowledge of that punishment looming over them. Sign this petition to bring back our individuality within the world and make Britain great again.
